projects.title: Max Align Dental
projects.subtitle: Modern Dental Clinic Website
projects.description: Developed from scratch using Frontend, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, Responsive Design, and JavaScript to ensure complete control over design and performance.
highlights: Modern & Responsive Design - Clean, professional interface that looks beautiful on all devices
Fast Loading & Optimized Performance - Lightweight coding and optimized images ensure quick loading
Professional Branding - Carefully selected color palette, fonts, and icons match the clinic's image
Service Showcase - Detailed sections highlight dental treatments and orthodontic solutions
Patient-Friendly Navigation - Clear menus and call-to-action buttons guide patients effortlessly
Integrated Features - Appointment booking, contact forms, Google Maps integration, and SEO-friendly
Secure & Scalable - Built with best practices for security and future upgrades
Engaging Visuals & Animations - Professional look that enhances user experience

projects.title: Preesha Global
projects.subtitle: Corporate Business Website
projects.description: Built on WordPress for flexibility, easy management, and scalability tailored to corporate business needs.
highlights: WordPress CMS - Flexibility, easy management, and scalability for corporate business
Custom Theme Development - Professional, corporate-style layout tailored to brand identity
Responsive Design - Fully mobile-friendly site using modern CSS and best practices
Fast & Optimized - Image compression, caching, and lightweight coding for speed
Service-Oriented Layout - Clearly highlights business services and expertise
SEO Integration - SEO-friendly permalinks, meta tags, and optimized structure
Professional Branding - Consistent typography and color palette for corporate image
Security Enhancements - WordPress security measures and regular update compatibility
Client-Friendly Admin Panel - Easy backend for content updates without coding
Lead Generation Focus - Clear calls-to-action and inquiry forms
Scalable Architecture - Ready for future expansion and additional features
